summary: is it possible to add a WebView as an overlay?

comments.content: I'm trying to load a webview as an overlay when tap on marker. Is this possible?

Now that the MapView is a ViewGroup, you can add views that are fixed to a geopoint. If you want to add a View that is fixed to the screen, like a dialog, then put your MapView inside another ViewGroup and add your view to the parent ViewGroup.

For further help, please post on the google group or on StackOverflow.
